quote: The best advice was literally to get in and do and the rest will figure itself out.
why_clipworthy: Encourages proactive engagement and dispels the myth of needing everything figured out before starting.
suggested_hook: Struggling to find your footing in real estate? Here's the best advice for new agents.

quote: We are so lucky to get to do what we do, which is help people right, honestly and ethically.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the emotional and ethical fulfillment of being a REALTOR.
suggested_hook: Feeling burnt out? Remember why being a REALTOR is a privilege.
